gameController

类 GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameController.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for the game. Update data in the model GameEngine and show view through GameView.

    Contains all the functions in the menu bar.

    作者:
    Lekang Jiang

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      GameController(GameModel gameEngine, GameView gameView)
      Constructor of GameView

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeGame()
      Exit the game.
      void initializeGame(java.io.InputStream input, java.lang.String filename)
      Set the model GameEngine, and show the view
      void loadGame()
      Load a new map file.
      void loadGameFile()
      Load a new game, when the player choose a new map file
      void resetLevel()
      Move back to the beginning of current level.
      void saveGame()
      Save the current game to a new map file.
      void saveScore()
      Save current score.
      void setEventFilter()
      Set event handler for the game, when key is pressed, the keeper could move
      void showAbout()
      Show the information about this game.
      void toggleDebug()
      Toggle for debug.
      void toggleMusic()
      Play the music if it stops; stop the music if it is playing.
      void undo()
      Move back to the last step.
